text: DISHONOUR BROUGHT TO MEMBERS OF PARLIAMENT
.. 9.30 . [ ] . The Parliament met at 9.30 a.m., MR. SPEAKER [THE HON. CHAMAL RAJAPAKSA] in the Chair.
- . .. ( ) ( .. - ) (The Hon. S.B. Nawinne - Minister of Labour) , , , 10, , 80 .. .
. Petition ordered to be referred to the Committee on Public Petitions.
I : : The following Motion stood on the Order Paper:

"That notwithstanding the provisions of Standing Order No. 7 and the motion agreed to by Parliament on 09.07.2010, the hours of sitting on Tuesday, April 21st, 2015 shall be 9.30 a.m. to 6.00 p.m. At 6.00 p.m. Mr. Speaker shall adjourn the Parliament without question put." ( ) ( - ) (The Hon. Lakshman Kiriella - Minister of Plantation Industries and Leader of the House of Parliament) Sir, there is an Amendment to the above Item, the time to read as "7.30 p.m.". Accordingly, I move,

That notwithstanding the provisions of Standing Order No. 7 and the motion agreed to by Parliament on 09.07.2010, the hours of sitting on Tuesday, April 21st, 2015 shall be 9.30 a.m. to 7.30 p.m. At 7.30 p.m. Mr. Speaker shall adjourn the Parliament without question put. , . . Question put, and agreed to. DISHONOUR BROUGHT TO MEMBERS OF PARLIAMENT
Sir, I would like to bring this to your notice. " " :
Mahinda and Gota summoned by Bribery Commission; Basil also on arrival.
I do not know whether the Hon. Basil Rajapaksa has arrived. We hope he will arrive because he has already been granted leave. That is another issue, but the headline is very clear.

( ) (The Hon. Bandula Gunawardane) . . rose. ( , , , ) ( - , , , ) (The Hon. Ranil Wickremasinghe - Prime Minister, Minister of Policy Planning, Economic Affairs, Child, Youth and Cultural Affairs) . .
. ( ) ( . - ) (The Hon. Ajith P. Perera - Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs) ? ( ) (The Hon. Bandula Gunawardane) , ? ?
. . . ( ) (Mr. Speaker) . ( ) ( - ) (The Hon. Nimal Siripala de Silva - Leader of the Opposition) ,-
( ) (The Hon. Ranil Wickremasinghe) I will speak after the Hon. Nimal Siripala de Silva. ( ) (The Hon. Nimal Siripala de Silva) , . , , . . . . . , , , . . - safeguards - . . , . , . , . .

While any person holds office as President, no proceedings shall be instituted or continued against him in any court or tribunal in respect of anything done or omitted to be done by him either in his official or private capacity.

.. ( .. ) (The Hon. A.D. Susil Premajayantha) . [ ] I am on my feet. You should know how to behave in Parliament. I am on my feet with the permission of the Hon. Speaker. - [Interruption.] No. I took oaths as an Attorney-at-Law in 1985, which was very much before you. You think that you - [Interruption.] Who are you ?
.. ( .. ) (The Hon. A.D. Susil Premajayantha) Please sit down; I am on my feet. Do not disturb me. Try to control yourself. You should know how to behave.
.. ( .. ) (The Hon. A.D. Susil Premajayantha) ? ( ) (The Hon. Ranil Wickremasinghe)

( ) (The Hon. Vasudeva Nanayakkara) , , , . . , . . , . . It is peculiarly within his knowledge why the former President has been asked to go before the Bribery Commission to make a statement. . , ? ? . ? . , . . . .
( ) (Mr. Speaker) . ( ) (The Hon. Lakshman Kiriella) , . [ ] We are ready for a debate of two days. , . ( ) (Mr. Speaker) , . [ ] ( ) (The Hon. Wimal Weerawansa)

( ) (The Hon. Wimal Weerawansa) ,- ( ) (The Hon. Lakshman Kiriella) ,- ( ) (Mr. Speaker) . , .
II ( ) (The Hon. Lakshman Kiriella) Sir, I move,
"That this Parliament at its rising this day do adjourn until 9.30 a.m. on Tuesday, April 21st, 2015." , . . Question put, and agreed to.
[At this stage, some Members of the Opposition walked into the Well of the House and created an uproar.]
Adjourned accordingly at 10.35 a.m. until 9.30 a.m. on Tuesday, 21st April, 2015, pursuant to the Resolution of Parliament of this Day.

. NOTE Corrections which Members suggest for the Final Print should be clearly marked in their copy and sent to be Editor of HANSARD within two weeks of receipt of the uncorrected copy. Contents of Proceedings : Final set of manuscripts Received from Parliament : Printed copies dispatched :
